description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the use after free vulnerability in Google Chrome:

1. Update Google Chrome to version 126.0.6478.115 or later.
2. Restart your browser to ensure that the update is applied.

**Details**:
- This update resolves potential heap corruption that could be exploited via crafted HTML pages.
- For more information, refer to the Microsoft Security Response Center [link](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-6103).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is capable of running the latest version of Google Chrome.
- Backup important browser data before updating.
